body_html:
So, I made some example playbooks that use these roles: https://github.com/kuza55/ansible-examples/tree/master/tensorflow

I also ended up writing up detailed instructions on how to use the playbooks I open sourced: https://medium.com/@kuza55/deep-learning-in-the-cloud-tensorflow-on-ec2-spot-instances-with-ansible-554ef7f59423#.ii8f4st5t

Would it be appropriate to link the Medium post in the community section?
